means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 艾恩芒格职业名称，铁货商，来源于中世纪英语及古英语，含义是“铁+商人”(iron+dealer,trader)

sentence.Network_en: In great Britain they used to call a hardware store an ironmonger's shop.
sentence.Network_cn: 英国人过去把“hardwarestore”(五金店)称为 “ ironmonger'sshop”.

sentence.Network_en: His father, John Donne , was a well - to - do ironmonger and citizen of London.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的父亲是伦敦一个富裕的五金商人.

sentence.Network_en: He got his windmill on a system of easy payments that staggered even the ironmonger himself.
sentence.Network_cn: 他买下了风车,付款条件之优惠,连五金商本人都感到惊异.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 常见英语后缀 - 豆丁网 ... monger=a dealer 商人，常用以构成复合词 ironmonger 五金商 227. - mony 表示性质等.
ironmaster 铁工厂厂长ironmonger 铁器商ironmongery 铁器类
Ironman 高阶程式语言 Ironman硬体专家 ironmongerIR冲突Q IRQ conflict
fashionmonger 讲时髦的人，赶时髦的人ironmonger铁器商，小五金商gossipmonger 传播流言蜚语的人

list.abs: invalid chair wheel chair 轮椅ironmonger hardware store 五金店jam jelly 果酱

entry.tran: 五金经销商;五金店店主
entry.def: An ironmonger is a shopkeeper who sells articles for the house and garden such as tools, nails, and pans.
An ironmonger or an ironmonger's is a shop where articles for the house and garden such as tools, nails, and pans are sold.

sentences.sentence: "in England they call a hardwareman an ironmonger"

auth_sentence.content: Stuart Bemrose, 43, and Dean Ironmonger, 50, were found not guilty of the charges.
auth_sentence.res_content: Stuart Bemrose, 43, and Dean Ironmonger, 50, were found not guilty of the charges.
